title: "New AI-based versatile software for tracking many cells in 3D microscope videos"
excerpt: "The first deep-learning software was developed as a versatile tool for tracking cells and extracting their signals from ~100 cells in a moving worm brain, in a zebrafish heart, and ~1,000 cultured cancer cells in 3D microscope videos."
